content: the idea for these mittens came about from some minty green yarn in my stash the color reminded me of mint chocolate chip ice cream so i paired the minty green yarn with some chocolatey brown yarn and created these mittens inspired by one of my favorite ice cream flavors feel free to make your mittens in your favorite color/flavor these mittens can be worked flat or in the round instructions are given for both this pattern includes three sizes - child size adult small and adult large both left and right mitten are worked the same this pattern is free to use but please consider making an extra pair of mittens to donate to charity
